name: Talos Gateway
tagline: Centralized REST API for agent audit and authorization.
problem: Unmonitored agent-to-tool communication and lack of audit trails.
outcome: Unified control plane for all agentic interactions with centralized logging.

name: Talos Dashboard
tagline: Visual command center for your agentic infrastructure.
problem: Opaque agent operations making incident response difficult.
outcome: Real-time visibility into audit logs, capability usage, and system health.

name: Talos Audit Service
tagline: Immutable, tamper-evident logging and compliance microservice.
problem: Lack of verifiable accountability in autonomous agent interactions.
outcome: Merkle-tree anchored audit trails providing post-hoc verification and timing proofs.

name: Talos MCP Connector
tagline: The bridge between legacy Model Context Protocol servers and the Talos Network.
problem: Legacy MCP servers lacking the cryptographic security required for autonomous ecosystems.
outcome: Instant, zero-code upgrade of existing MCP tools to secure Talos-compatible resources.

name: Talos UCP Connector
tagline: Enable AI Agents to transact securely on the Universal Commerce Protocol.
problem: AI Agents cannot safely perform financial transactions or negotiate with merchants.
outcome: Policy-enforced, autonomous commerce with opaque payment handling.

name: Talos Setup Agent
tagline: Secure, local infrastructure bootstrapper for the Talos ecosystem.
problem: Manual setup of cryptographic infrastructure is error-prone and insecure.
outcome: One-click, verified deployment of local Talos stacks via the Dashboard.

name: Secure DevOps Agent
tagline: Autonomous infrastructure automation secured by Talos.
problem: Security risks of granting high-privilege credentials to autonomous agents.
outcome: End-to-end secure automation of AWS, Kubernetes, and Terraform workflows.

name: Secure AI Chat
tagline: Privacy-first chat application with end-to-end encryption.
problem: Centralized chat platforms intercepting and analyzing private communications.
outcome: Fully decentralized, DID-based encrypted messaging with immutable audit logs.

name: Talos Contracts
tagline: The single source of truth for Talos Protocol schemas and vectors.
problem: Fragmented security schemas across multiple languages and services.
outcome: Strict, contract-driven interoperability and deterministic verification.

name: Talos Core Rust
tagline: High-performance cryptographic kernel for the Talos ecosystem.
problem: Performance bottlenecks in cryptographic operations and encoding.
outcome: Blazing fast, memory-safe kernel wedge for critical security paths.

name: TypeScript SDK
tagline: Build secure agentic toolchains in Node.js and Browser.
problem: Complex cryptographic workflows taxing frontend and backend developers.
outcome: Seamless, type-safe integration of Talos primitives into JS/TS apps.

name: Python SDK
tagline: The authoritative SDK for AI researchers and engineers.
problem: Lack of security primitives in mainstream AI agent frameworks.
outcome: Native integration with LangChain, AutoGPT, and custom AI toolchains.

name: Java SDK
tagline: Enterprise-grade JVM implementation of the Talos Protocol.
problem: Integrating agentic security into large-scale, legacy Java/Kotlin ecosystems.
outcome: Thread-safe, Spring-compatible security primitives for the enterprise JVM.

name: Go SDK
tagline: High-throughput, concurrent-safe implementation for cloud-native agents.
problem: Performance overhead in high-frequency agentic communication and trading.
outcome: Lightning-fast secure sessions leveraging Go's native concurrency model.
